name: forget
chn: vt. & vi. 忘记做, 遗忘
example_en: I always forget to bring my umbrella when it rains.
example_cn: 下雨时我总是忘记带伞。
memory_tips: 词根 'for-' 表示 '远离'，'get' 表示 '得到'，合起来表示 '远离得到'，即 '忘记'。可以联想为 '忘记' 就是把东西 '远离' 你的记忆。图像记忆：想象一个场景，你站在雨中，手里没有伞，因为你 '忘记' 带了。

image_prompt.main_image: A person standing in the rain without an umbrella, looking confused and wet, symbolizing the act of forgetting something important.
image_prompt.example_image: A scene showing a person walking out of their house, looking back at an umbrella left by the door, with rain starting to fall outside.
